synopsis.text: Ogreâ€™s Treasures, Mario and the Giant Peach, and Snow White are reimagined in the Amada Anime Series: Super Mario Bros, a trilogy of OVAs that combines classic fairy tales with beloved video game characters. Released exclusively in Japan in 1989, this rare collection features Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach, Bowser, and his Koopalings in three 15-minute anime episodes based on traditional Japanese folktales. Each episode showcases the characters in a new light, as they navigate through the twists and turns of Momotarou, Issun-boushi, and Shirayuki-hime. With its unique blend of fairy tales and video game lore, the Amada Anime Series: Super Mario Bros is a must-see for fans of both genres.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
